Note: For the ordinary version see 5671 and 6049.
_description: Gospel for the Fourth Sunday in Advent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Þe maisters of þe iuwes lawsScribis & pharisews wis of saws…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Whare saint iohne was baptisandAnd preched to folk þat he fand
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “MIserunt iudei ab ierosolimis & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica iiii aduentus domini Euangelium secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 9rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.195-199.
